content: dishcloth chain 24 row 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain across turn ~ 23 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in front loop only of first single_crochet single_crochet in back loop only of next single_crochet single_crochet in front loop only of next single_crochet across turn ~ 12 single_crochet in front loop only 11 single_crochet in back loop only row 3-21 repeat row 2 nineteen more times row 22 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across turn ~ 23 single_crochet edging elegant dishcloth chain 1 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in each single_crochet across to by alaina smith lovinghandscrochet last single_crochet 3 single_crochet in last single_crochet single_crochet in end of each row to pattern difficulty intermediate next corner 3 single_crochet in corner chain single_crochet in each chain across to last chain 3 single_crochet in last chain single_crochet in end of finished size 6¾ /17 cm square each row to next corner single_crochet in same st as first single_crochet gauge 15 single_crochet x 14 row in pattern = 4 /10 cm join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet finish off ~ 96 single_crochet materials size us h-8 5mm crochet hook or size needed for gauge medium weight cotton yarn 1 oz /28g 48 yds /44 m abbreviations pattern is written with us abbreviations us abbreviation uk equivalent chain chain chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet st s stitch es st s stitch es notes repeat instructions in braces as indicated these are shorter repeats they are written this way to help simplify the written instructions and make things easier to read © alaina smith 2026 elegant dishcloth
